extendedInfo.description: Embark on an exciting match-3 adventure full of candy swiping action! Enter the quirky, candy filled world of Lep the leprechaun. Play as Lep the humble candy maker whoâs just had his pot of candies stolen by the notorious candy thief of Candy Land. Chase the candy thief across Candy Land, and collect the candies he drops in a rush to his hideout. Travel throughout Candy Land in this saga searching for the perpetrator â all the way from your candy farm to the factory at the other end of the candy island. Find Lepâs enemy and rush the candy thief!Your objective is to reclaim the candies that were stolen from Lep. Swipe and match your way to the candy pot at the end of the trail. Collect the candies spilled along the path as you progress through each level. Use power-ups to rush your way through; toss color bombs, or fire candy cane rockets, and play quickly to trigger âSugar Rushâ â which turns you into a candy monster hungry enough to eat the entire candy island.  Achieve global candy domination and prove to your friends that youâre the master of Candy Pop by sharing those scores over Facebook.With fast-paced candy swipe action, 40 levels, and several upgradable power-ups, Candy Pop is a fantastic match-3 puzzler that gives you lots of reasons to keep coming back for more.âºâºâºâºâºFEATURESâââââ----------------------âºIntuitive match-3 gameplay with 9 unique candies to swipe and match.âº4 unique, upgradable power-ups.âº40 challenging levels.âºPost your scores on Facebook and compete with friends.âºKids friendly content â A real eye candy for kids - Bring out the creativity in your children! No violence or monsters or zombies or scares.============================================================PRIVACY POLICY:As a designer of kidsâ games, we understand how important privacy is in this modern, digital world. You can read our privacy policy here: www.nuttyapps.com/privacypolicy.IN-APP PURCHASES: This app lets you purchase digital content using actual money. On Google Wallet, you can configure parental controls to avoid unintentional purchases.NEED HELP?Contact us with any questions or comments: nuttyfeedback@gmail.comNOTE:App supports Android 2.2(Froyo) to Android 4.x Ice Cream Sandwich and Jellybean.DISCLAIMER:All BGMs are the property of Kevin MacLeod. reviews.title: Candy crush saga
